{%if(amount===0){%} {%=options.amountLayout==='string'?'第0/0页':options.amountLayout==='number'?'0/0':'第0/0页'%} {%}else{%} {%=options.amountLayout==='string'?'第'+current+'/'+amount+'页':options.amountLayout==='number'?current+'/'+amount:'第'+current+'/'+amount+'页'%} {%}%} {%=options.shiftText[0]%} {%if(options.isNumShow){%} {%if(start>1){%} 1 {%if(start>2){%} ... {%}}} %} {%_.each(_.range(start,end+1),function(i){ %} {%=i%} {%})%} {%if(amount > end ){if(amount-1>end ){%} ... {%}%} {%=amount%} {%}%} {%=options.shiftText[1]%} {%if(options.isSkipShow&&amount>1){%} 到第   页  {%}%}
